attributes.action: Misleading campaign on EU Referendum Rules triggering a 2nd EU Referendum
attributes.additional_details:
http://dailym.ai/28SuePi
Good morning Britain - Nigel Farage Admits £350M saving for NHS in EU was a mistake
http://m.huffpost.com/uk/entry/uk_576d0aa3e4b08d2c5638fc17?edition=uk
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to investigate and consider a new EU referendum as Brexit Supporters were mislead and fed lies by the Leave campaign to believe that part of the money we pay to be in Europe was going on the NHS.
